message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. You'll still get a significant amount, and we can end this game early.

I appreciate your offer but I think we can do better. Let's split it 60-40, with me getting the larger share this time. It's only fair, as you got the better end of the deal last round. Let's end this quickly.
You wanted 60-40 in your favor, but I think my initial offer was more reasonable. Considering the inflation, I'll give you a bit less this time. Take it before the money loses more value for you.
